Package com.dnikitin.hotel.exceptions

package com.dnikitin.hotel.exceptions
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    com.dnikitin.hotel
     
    com.dnikitin.hotel.commandcontrol
     
    com.dnikitin.hotel.model
     
  • Exception Classes
    Class
    Description
    CommandCreationException
    Thrown when a command class exists but cannot be instantiated (e.g. due to constructor failure or visibility issues).
    HotelDataException
    Thrown when there is an error reading or writing persistent hotel data, for example from a CSV file.
    InvalidCommandException
    Thrown when a requested command is not registered in the system.
    RoomFreeException
    Thrown when an operation (like checkout) is attempted on a room that is already free.
    RoomNotFoundException
    Thrown when an operation is attempted on a room number that does not exist in the hotel.
    RoomOccupiedException
    Thrown when an operation (like check-in) is attempted on a room that is already occupied.
    RoomSmallCapacityException
    Thrown when a check-in is attempted with more guests than the room's capacity allows.
